title: Netflix’s Big Plans for Anime Include a Mappa Team-Up
full_text: Netflix’s Big Plans for Anime Include a Mappa Team-Up. With the power of a godlike anime studio on its side, Netflix is eyeing multiple new Mappa projects now in production to exclusively stream on its platform..
